Title: The Bit Player
Writer: Zig Madamba Dulay (story), Antoinette Jadaone (story), Jeffrey Jeturian (story), Zig Madamba Dulay (screenplay), Antoinette Jadaone (screenplay), Jeffrey Jeturian (screenplay)
Actors: Nenita Deanoso, Karen Leslie Dematera, Boobsie, Cris Castillo
Plot: The movie follows a seemingly usual day in the life of Loida Malabanan as she embarks on yet another shooting day of a soap opera as an extra. As the shoot goes on we get a glimpse of truth...
